resources.string:
Hello, my name is PaperMountain. 

 I am really hardworking, i wish to become fit one day, but i kept on eating junk food. I feel that i lack discipline. Sometimes I wish that i can have more brainpower to think for code. I am sure that with more practice, i can do it. 

Currently, i am learning Android Dev for my school project. It feels that i wasted the last term trying to learn from the teacher because the materials on Java is really not enough at all, especially the android programming portion. 

I get stressed up easily because of my personality and some previous bad habits that i have built up since secondary school. It has been affecting me alot, its time to change it! I am sure that i can do this.
